title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 18, ch. II, subch. F, art. 3, pt. 620 - Public Assistance And Care Reimbursement Claiming
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 18, ch. II, subch. F, art. 3, pt. 620 - Public Assistance And Care Reimbursement Claiming

State Regulations
§ 620.1 - Reimbursement for public assistance and care
§ 620.2 - Allocation of expenditures for public assistance and care
§ 620.3 - Conditions for claiming for public assistance and care programs
§ 620.4 to 620.6 - [Repealed]
Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 18, ch. II, subch. F, art. 3, pt. 620

Statutory authority: Social Services Law, §§20, 34, 153, 193;L. 1995, ch. 81, §§ 155-159, 195-199

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
